name: Carrot
description: A root vegetable known for its vibrant orange color and rich in vitamin A.

name: Spinach
description: A leafy green vegetable packed with iron, vitamins, and minerals.

name: Cucumber
description: A refreshing and hydrating vegetable often used in salads and sandwiches.

name: Bell Pepper
description: A colorful and crunchy vegetable available in various colors, used in cooking and salads.

name: Broccoli
description: A cruciferous vegetable with green florets, known for its high nutritional value.

name: Tomato
description: A versatile fruit often treated as a vegetable in cooking, used in various dishes and sauces.

name: Lettuce
description: A leafy green vegetable commonly used in salads and sandwiches.

name: Zucchini
description: A summer squash with a mild flavor, used in both savory and sweet dishes.

name: Kale
description: A nutrient-dense leafy green vegetable known for its health benefits.

name: Cauliflower
description: A versatile vegetable often used as a low-carb substitute for rice or mashed potatoes.

name: Green Beans
description: Long, slender beans that are usually cooked before consumption.

name: Asparagus
description: A spring vegetable with tender shoots and a unique flavor.

name: Peas
description: Sweet and nutritious green peas often used in various dishes.

name: Radish
description: A crunchy root vegetable available in various colors, used in salads and as a garnish.

name: Eggplant
description: A purple vegetable with a smooth skin, often used in Mediterranean and Asian cuisines.

name: Brussels Sprouts
description: Small, cabbage-like vegetables known for their slightly bitter taste.

name: Celery
description: A crunchy and hydrating vegetable often used as a snack or in cooking.

name: Artichoke
description: A thistle-like vegetable known for its edible heart and leaves.

name: Beetroot
description: A root vegetable with a deep red color, often used in salads and juices.

name: Cabbage
description: A leafy vegetable available in various types, used in coleslaw and sauerkraut.

name: Sweet Potato
description: A starchy root vegetable with a sweet taste, often used in casseroles and fries.

name: Onion
description: A pungent and flavorful bulb vegetable used as a base in many dishes.

name: Garlic
description: A pungent and aromatic bulb used to add flavor to a wide range of dishes.

name: Mushroom
description: Edible fungi available in various types, used in cooking and as a meat substitute.

name: Pumpkin
description: A type of winter squash often used in soups, pies, and baked goods.

name: Turnip
description: A root vegetable with a slightly peppery flavor, often used in stews and roasts.

name: Leek
description: A mild-flavored vegetable related to onions and garlic, often used in soups and salads.

name: Okra
description: A green pod vegetable often used in Southern and Indian cuisines.

name: Romaine Lettuce
description: A type of lettuce with crisp leaves, commonly used in Caesar salads.

name: Cilantro
description: An herb with a distinct flavor often used in various cuisines and salsas.

name: Butternut Squash
description: A winter squash with a sweet, nutty flavor, often used in soups and dishes.

name: Apple
description: A popular fruit with a variety of flavors and colors, often enjoyed as a snack or used in cooking.

name: Banana
description: A tropical fruit known for its natural sweetness and versatility in recipes.

name: Orange
description: A citrus fruit with a refreshing flavor, often enjoyed fresh or as juice.

name: Grapes
description: Small, sweet, and juicy berries often eaten fresh or used to make wine and raisins.

name: Strawberry
description: A red, juicy berry known for its sweet taste and used in various desserts and dishes.

name: Blueberry
description: Small, round berries with a blue hue, often used in muffins, pancakes, and smoothies.

name: Watermelon
description: A juicy and refreshing fruit with a high water content, commonly enjoyed in the summer.

name: Mango
description: A tropical fruit known for its sweet and tangy flavor, often eaten fresh or in smoothies.

name: Pineapple
description: A tropical fruit with a sweet and tangy taste, often used in both savory and sweet dishes.

name: Peach
description: A fuzzy-skinned fruit with a juicy and fragrant flesh, often enjoyed fresh or in desserts.

name: Pear
description: A juicy and sweet fruit with a distinct shape, often used in salads and desserts.

name: Kiwi
description: A small, green fruit with a tangy flavor and edible seeds, often eaten with the skin.

name: Cherry
description: Small, round fruits with a sweet or tart flavor, often used in pies and desserts.

name: Plum
description: A juicy fruit with a smooth skin and sweet taste, available in various colors.

name: Raspberry
description: Small, red berries with a sweet and slightly tart flavor, often used in desserts and jams.

name: Blackberry
description: Dark purple-black berries with a sweet and tangy flavor, used in various culinary applications.

name: Cantaloupe
description: A melon with orange flesh and a sweet taste, commonly enjoyed as a refreshing snack.

name: Honeydew
description: A melon with pale green flesh and a sweet flavor, often used in fruit salads.

name: Pomegranate
description: A unique fruit with juicy arils that have a sweet-tart flavor, often used in salads and juices.

name: Lemon
description: A citrus fruit with a sour flavor, used for its juice and zest in cooking and beverages.

name: Lime
description: A small, green citrus fruit with a tangy flavor, used in cooking and beverages.

name: Coconut
description: A tropical fruit known for its white flesh and versatile use in both sweet and savory dishes.

name: Fig
description: A sweet and soft fruit with a unique texture and flavor, often enjoyed fresh or dried.

name: Grapefruit
description: A citrus fruit with a tangy and slightly bitter taste, often eaten for its health benefits.

name: Avocado
description: A creamy and nutrient-rich fruit often used in salads, spreads, and guacamole.

name: Papaya
description: A tropical fruit with orange flesh and a sweet flavor, often eaten fresh or in smoothies.

name: Dragonfruit
description: A vibrant and exotic fruit with a mild, slightly sweet flavor.

name: Passion Fruit
description: A small fruit with a unique, aromatic flavor, often used in beverages and desserts.

name: Lychee
description: A small, sweet fruit with a rough skin and translucent flesh, often enjoyed fresh.

name: Guava
description: A tropical fruit with a fragrant aroma and sweet taste, used in both sweet and savory dishes.

name: Persimmon
description: A fruit with a sweet and slightly astringent flavor, available in various varieties.
